Articles.Content: Hi I have a little problem, if i play KSP my FPS drops like every 20 to 30 seconds from solid 30-40 to something round or under 20... I think my Hardware isn't that bad. I currently running my system on Win10 but i had the same problems under Win7... I have quite a bit of mods installed right now, but the problem also occured when i played vanilla... So i would be glad if there is a solution for that Problem.
